front.title: Requirements for a Protocol to Replace AppleTalk NBP

abstract.t: One of the implicitly understood goals amongst the participants working on "Multicast DNS", "Link-Local Multicast Name Resolution", "Zeroconf Name Service", "Bonjour" (or whatever you like to call it) is the ability to retire AppleTalk Name Binding Protocol, NetBIOS naming, and the like, and replace them with an all-IP solution. This document outlines the specific properties required of an IP replacement for AppleTalk Name Binding Protocol.
